description.text: I'm a professional Software Engineer currently working in the brazilian financial market, developing and maintaining credit card terminal apps, digital banking, sales portal, and other demanded softwares of the sector.

description.education-and-experience-intro: I'm graduating in Software Engineering at
description.education-and-experience-details: and currently working in a local growing company as a Software Engineer, in my daily working I usually use the JavaScript programming language, that I have a bigger experience, I also use frameworks like Vue, Nuxt, React, Next and databases like PostgresSQL, MySQL and MongoDB.

profile.datails: a Software Engineer and Technology Enthusiast driven by a passion for new knowledge and experiences.
